meanings.definition: Examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary.
meanings.sent1: I reviewed my homework before turning it in to make sure it was correct.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reviewed the students' essays to provide feedback.
meanings.sent3: After I reviewed my messy room, I decided it needed a major cleanup.
meanings.sent4: She reviewed the budget carefully, looking for areas to cut expenses.
meanings.sent5: The detective reviewed the evidence, searching for clues to solve the case.

meanings.definition: Look over, study, or examine again.
meanings.sent1: He reviewed his notes before the exam to refresh his memory.
meanings.sent2: The editor reviewed the manuscript for any errors before publishing.
meanings.sent3: I reviewed the movie for the third time, noticing new details each viewing.
meanings.sent4: The scientist reviewed the data repeatedly to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The artist reviewed the sketch, making small adjustments to perfect it.
